message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. This is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'd like to get closer to the value I think it's worth to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $9,500 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I'm asking for $10,750. This is still a great price for you, and it gives me a fair return on my investment. Let's close this deal!

I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, Alice, but $10,750 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10,250. I think this is a fair price for both of us, considering the value I think the product will bring me.
